channel.title: WEBCLIENT HELP going to error! :(
channel.description:
I am using Hostgator.com as my website maker peoples. I put my client.jar on and a default.html file on there that has this in it:
<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>ShadeScape WebClient</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="ShadeScape" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML> The website is www.ragester.com/default.html
I don't know how to fix this it loads the java and then it goes to the Host Gator error page! HELP PLEASE

item.title: WEBCLIENT HELP going to error! :(
item.dc:creator: @Luponic Luponic
item.description:
@Luponic wrote:

[quote=“chippeh, post:2, topic:336445”]Your jar doesn’t exist…

the client.jar has to be a url to where you uploaded your jar…

ex: mysite.com/client.jar

try something like that, you should be able to downoad the jar from that link in order for it to be working correctly… ;)[/quote]

I’ll try that. Thanks I’ll tell ya if it works.

I use this code if this is what you meant:[code=html4strict]

ShadeScape WebClient [/code]

And it just shows an error XP and the .jar file is on the ftp though… idk what to do. Anyone have any ideas???

Read full topic

the client.jar has to be a url to where you uploaded your jar…

ex: mysite.com/client.jar

try something like that, you should be able to downoad the jar from that link in order for it to be working correctly… ;)[/quote]

This is also in the wrong section, it should be in the client help section.
